ability.Marine Apex: This Pokemon's attacks deal 20% more damage to Water-type opponents.
ability.Amphibious Armor: In rain, this Pokemon's Defense and Special Defense are 1.5x.

Tidal Fang.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Fierce Gaze.effect: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed.

Scale Shield.effect: Raises the users Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

Ancient Tide.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
